Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 293-1 Filed 05/25/21 Page 338 of 349

By signing this agreement, Epstein asserts and certifies that the above has been read and explained to him. Epstein hereby states that he understands the conditions of this Non-Prosecution Agreement and agrees to comply with them.

R. ALEXANDER ACOSTA
UNITED STATES ATTORNEY

Dated: ____________________ By: _____________________________________
A. MARIE VILLAFANA
ASSISTANT U.S. ATTORNEY

COUNSEL TO JEFFREY EPSTEIN

Dated: 9-24-07 LILLY ANN SANCHEZ, ESQ.
ATTORNEY FOR JEFFREY EPSTEIN

Page 7 of 7

DOJ-OGR-00004635

additional_notes: The document is a Non-Prosecution Agreement signed by Jeffrey Epstein and his attorneys. The agreement is dated 9-24-07. The document appears to be a court filing, with a case number and document number at the top.
